input_text: Ang lahat ng aking mga kuko maliban sa isa ay nasa ballpark ng 1 1/8" - 1 1/2" ang haba nang ang aking ring finger nail ay putok sa mabilis noong Lunes! Ito ay ang pangalawang break sa parehong kamay sa loob ng isang buwan, kaya sa wakas kailangan kong maging compulsive at gawin ang lahat ng mga kuko sa parehong haba! marahil ay kinatutulan ko ang higit sa kalahati ng haba ng libreng gilid. Bilang isang side note, naging seryosong nag-gigit ako ng kuko sa buong aking pagkabata at high school. May mga re-relapse din ako sa aking adulthood, ngunit ang punto na sinusubukan kong sabihin ay ang aking mga pinto ng kuko ay talagang maikling, at sa palagay ko ang aking mga kuko na maikling ay nagpapakita ng tungkol sa 1/8" ng aking mga tudol ng daliri at mukhang malungkot!
summary_text: OPI Nail Envy!

summary_text:
As if Sweep/Smash spec wasn't already borderline OP in PvP, prepare to see a lot more of them come 1.4 buffs. 
 EDIT: Don't want to give the impression that I thought Focus spec was totally and absolutely broken. It does have weaknesses like lack of sustain and nothing to really fall back on if Smash doesn't hit (at least till the next cooldown). Also it's one of those specs that is very gear dependent, meaning with bad gear, it is very very bad because of the weaknesses above. But it's also a spec that gets exponentially better once you have awesome gear because everything is focused down to a single bursty AOE attack that automatically crits and is kinetic damage so Knights can completely ignore accuracy and crit rating and stack main stat, power, and surge (which explains the 6.7k+ hits). So again, didn't think it was broken, but did think it was a bit too strong pre 1.4. And now it's getting buffed. Sadface.jpg

input_text: Nu, nu eşti singur. Nici eu nu am luat unul. Am stat la BRC când soţia mea a luat-o. Instructorul pe care îl obţii când iei MSF este esenţial în ceea ce priveşte cât de benefică va fi experienţa ta BRC. Instructorii soţiei mele erau doar câţiva băieţi buni care câştigau puţin bani în weekenduri. Cred că mulţi piloţi noi au pus prea mult în ceea ce spune un instructor al cursului MSF, ca şi cum ar fi ei cei de la sfârşitul tuturor în tehnica motocicletelor. Curriculumul este în esenţă aceleaşi tehnici de conducere defensive învăţate în şcoala de liceu. Nu este o fasole magică care te împiedică să mori pe stradă. Nu este nici o clasă magică obişnuită. Lucrul ei nu era bine orientat
summary_text: The MSF, while a good base, isn't going to transform anyone into a good rider. Common sense, respect for the machine, a thirst for knowledge (and research), the ability to think critically and apply that to the controls and a host of traits that some people just don't have will go a lot farther to surviving your motorcycle.

input_text: Kisah latar belakang: F250 ini telah ada di keluarga saya sejak saya bahkan bisa benar-benar ingat. Suatu hari di jalan pulang (Nebraska) dari Oklahoma kami menarik sebuah trailer dan melihat asap dari bawah kapsul. Jadi kami melompat keluar dan mematikan kapsul dan turun dan melihat hal-hal yang membakar. Untungnya kami berada di sebuah tempat istirahat dan beberapa pengemudi truk memiliki pemadam kebakaran. Tapi sudah terlambat banyak truk telah terbakar. Datang untuk mengetahui bahwa jalur bahan bakar telah rusak. Nah itu adalah satu-satunya truk yang kami miliki pada saat itu yang bisa menarik dan uang yang ketat jadi kami mengganti interiornya dan membuatnya berjalan dengan benar dan terus menggunakannya. Sekitar setahun kemudian ayah saya dan saya sedang mengganti minyak dan clank di pan drain. Saya melihat melalui dan untuk kehegan saya mendengar potongan piston. Jadi saya memarkirkan beberapa tahun kemudian dan mendapatkan cat. Saya memutuskan untuk menggantinya dengan mobil yang sehat dan saya sendiri sekarang
summary_text: Truck caught fire then later found pieces of piston in oil and pan. Rebuilt it due to fond memories with my father.

input_text: Namun, pendekatan Peter Singer adalah salah satu utilitarianisme. Gagasan bahwa veganisme berkaitan dengan melakukan jumlah yang paling sedikit kerusakan mungkin. Seperti poster lain menunjukkan, tidak ada oposisi yang diperlukan antara kehidupan hewan dan kehidupan manusia, sejauh manusia dapat makan makanan vegetarian sekarang 'a' hari dan meninggalkan hewan. Dalam hal ini, Anda dapat meminimalkan kerusakan pada hewan (dengan tidak membunuhnya pasien, menghakimi kejam, dll) tanpa meningkatkan jumlah kerusakan material yang mungkin dilakukan (saya, jadi apa jika Anda tidak mengambil anak-anak). Jadi, vegan dapat menghindari konflik dengan anak-anak. Jadi, menurut pendapat saya, tidak mungkin memiliki alasan yang cukup untuk mengakhiri hidup secara efektif dan tidak dapat meminimalkan kehidupan manusia. Namun, jika Anda memiliki masalah kesehatan kesehatan kesehatan, Anda dapat mengakhiri hidup secara efektif dan tidak dapat menghemat hidup Anda sendiri.
summary_text: Both may be attempts to minimize suffering. Protecting a life is not the same as protecting the QUALITY of a life.
